pr_title: add the new languages translated in NewPipe

timeline.message:
Add some new languages to the language selector

ckb - Central Kurdish
jv - Javanese
kab - Kabyle

timeline.bodyText: Why the country name here and not just the code? I think that's better though, but then you should change it for the other languages as well to remain consistent. And why the () before but for the languages a few lines further after?
timeline.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText: I think it is good. No country code, because this would be in Latin letters and we'd have to deal with RTL and LTR in one line. And the () before the language name, because that's RTL, so still at the end of the line
replies.author: TobiGr

replies.bodyText: Oh, I incorrectly assumed Bengali was RTL as well, but apparently it's just LTR. My other point still stands, i.e. changing e.g. "Nederlands (BE)" to "Nederlands (België)" for more consistency.
replies.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText: Oh. I didn't see you reply. I'd say we can put that on our list for the next release, but not this one.
replies.author: TobiGr
